name: Ha!-Ha! Machine
description:
What can you hear when you constantly switch TV channels? Anything! And that is funny! The more channels, the funnier.

Ha! Ha! Machine crafts new phrases from smaller ones. Two rats operate this 3D automat by your command and generates, adds, removes those phrases. For unpredictable result add more content. Then craft the final phrase and have fun!

"Beaten man praises God fighting fleas", "Passionate sheep brawses dating site itching nervously" or "Gentleman ride the elevator with a sumo wrestler recollecting his lunch" - is roughly what can be get.
